question: The system used for rubbish/garbage collection in your local are is not working properly. This is causing problems you and your neighbours.Write a letter to the local council. In your letter •	Describe how the rubbish collection system is not working properly •	Explain how this is affecting you and your neighbours •	Suggest what should be done about the problem
text: I am writing this email to reflect on a few issues on the garbage collection system of floor 6 in presence of myself and my neighbours.

The rubbish collecting system does not function properly since August, and the main problem is that not all the litter can be easily and successfully put into the box. I and my neighbours have checked the entrance of the system and found that one button was missed due to unknown reasons.
We have been bothered by the smell of the garbages left around the collecting point and the litter has increased the potential risk to children's physical health, especially during the pandemic.

We hope the building management team could send expertise to have a check the system and have it repaired as soon as possible. Also, we suggest that it should be regularly examined every quarter in case it causes trouble to the community again.
